alert.note: Alert for Plymouth (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 12 at 3:19AM CDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota...Iowa... Big Sioux River near Richland affecting Union and Plymouth Counties. ...Observed flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity for the following rivers in South Dakota... Big Sioux River near Brookings affecting Brookings and Moody Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Big Sioux River near Richland. * WHEN...From early this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 1117.0 feet, lower pasture lands begin to flood, and the Millsite Access is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 1117.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:00 AM CDT Wednesday was 1117.1 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 1117.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (unknown time) Location Stg Stg Day/Time d1 d2 d3 Big Sioux River Richland 1117.0 1117.1 Wed 3 am MSG MSG MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning.
